channel.title: NameQuick Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.9.18
item.description:
NameQuick v1.9.18 Release Notes

üîß Bug Fixes

Fixed template prefix/suffix not persisting - When you edit an existing template, the prefix and suffix fields now show the actual values from when the template was created and persist across app sessions. No more losing your settings when you reopen the app.

Fixed transformation rules not persisting - Template transformation rules (like ‚Äúconvert to lowercase‚Äù or ‚Äúreplace spaces with hyphens‚Äù) now save properly and persist across app sessions instead of disappearing when you reopen the app.

This release fixes two annoying template editing issues: losing your prefix/suffix settings and transformation rules breaking when making changes to templates.
